bean.p:render: @{(dataObject.plannedCourseSummary.backupList.size() gt 0 or dataObject.plannedCourseSummary.plannedList.size() gt 0 or dataObject.plannedCourseSummary.academicTerms.size() gt 0) ? true : false}

property.name: onDocumentReadyScript
actionScript
actionScript
property.value: var additionalFormData = {viewId:'PlannedCourse-FormView', methodToCall:'addSavedCourse', courseId:'@{dataObject.courseSummaryDetails.courseId}', code:'@{dataObject.courseSummaryDetails.code}'}; submitHiddenForm('plan', additionalFormData, e);

property.name: render
property.value: @{dataObject.plannedCourseSummary.savedItemId ne null AND dataObject.plannedCourseSummary.plannedList.size() eq 0 AND dataObject.plannedCourseSummary.backupList.size() eq 0 AND dataObject.plannedCourseSummary.academicTerms.size() eq 0}

bean.p:messageText: Advisers are unable to add or bookmark courses and sections. [0]

property.name: render
property.value: @{dataObject.courseSummaryDetails.courseDescription ne null and dataObject.courseSummaryDetails.courseDescription.length() gt 0 ? true : false}

bean.p:messageText: This course has no description in the Course Catalog. Please contact the department for more details.

property.name: render
property.value: @{dataObject.courseSummaryDetails.courseDescription ne null and dataObject.courseSummaryDetails.courseDescription.length() gt 0 ? false : true}

property.name: messageText
property.value: Check with the department or your adviser for more information about this course.

property.value:

bean.p:messageText: Enrollment status is updated every few minutes.

bean.p:messageText: May not be eligible for Financial Aid

bean.p:render: @{#line.gradingOption eq null AND !#line.distanceLearning AND !#line.honorsSection AND !#line.jointOffering AND !#line.research AND !#line.writingSection AND !#line.serviceLearning AND !#line.newThisYear AND !#line.ineligibleForFinancialAid AND #line.feeAmount eq null AND !#line.independentStudy}

property.value: @{#line.code} is added. To delete or move, go to @{#line.longTermName} Plan.
